sentences.english: Black Storm welt and Black welt stitch.
sentences.chinese: 黑风暴伟力和黑贴边缝合。

sentences.english: Angled hand welt pockets, buttoned welt pockets at the back.
sentences.chinese: 角度的手贴边口袋，搞定伟力在后面的口袋。

sentences.english: Side-seam pockets, buttoned welt pockets at the back.
sentences.chinese: 侧缝口袋，搞定伟力在后面的口袋。

sentences.english: We have real power and we know it.
sentences.chinese: 我们具有真正的伟力，我们深知这一点。

sentences.english: This marvelous scenery has been bestowed by nature's great power.
sentences.chinese: 奇异的景观都是拜大自然的伟力所赐。

sentences.english: And though we are not now that strength which as old days moved earth and heaven.
sentences.chinese: 尽管我们不再有昔日的伟力，可以震天撼地。

sentences.english: They will be able to renew their faith in their country’s greatness.
sentences.chinese: 他们将重建对自己祖国伟力的信念。

sentences.english: The richest source of power to wage war lies in the masses of the people.
sentences.chinese: 战争的伟力之最深厚的根源，存在于民众之中。

sentences.english: Welt pocket at the left chest, flap welt pockets at the hips.
sentences.chinese: 世界报“在左胸前的口袋里，皮瓣伟力在臀部的口袋。
耐用的固特异伟力建设。

definition: vast and mighty (of river or ocean)/broad and powerful
to split heaven and earth apart (idiom); refers to the Pangu 盤古|盘古[Pan2 gu3] creation myth
good luck/Nature (as the mother of all things)
lit. to move mountains and drain seas/to transform nature
occult force/the power of a God or spirit
throughout time/from ancient times (up to the present)
a powerful current/a flood (often fig., e.g. a flood of ideas)
to grow and multiply without end
